name: Toku
headline: Account Receivables Platform for Latin American Enterprises
description: Toku helps companies increase their monthly revenue collection rate so they can focus on the their main business. Payment method management, failed payment retries, payment reminders, failed payment notifications, among others.

founders.name: Francisca Noguera, Founder
founders.description:
Co - Founder & CRO of Toku, love to talk with people and sing.

generated_description:
### Toku: Streamlining Payments for Latin America

Founded in 2020 and hailing from Mexico City, Toku aims to transform the way enterprises in Latin America handle their accounts receivables. As a startup that successfully entered Y Combinator's Batch S21, Toku is on a mission to help businesses enhance their revenue collection efficiency without diverting focus from their core operations.

Imagine running a business where following up on payments doesn't consume your time and resources. That‚Äôs precisely what Toku offers. The platform provides a suite of solutions designed to minimize failed payments and optimize cash flow. Features like automated payment retries, reminders, and robust payment notifications allow companies to collect revenues more effectively.

With a team of about 150 professionals, Toku is diving deep into the realms of fintech and SaaS, focusing on subscriptions, payments, and financial operations. They cater to a diverse set of industries, including real estate, insurance, education, telecommunications, and utilities, making their solutions highly versatile across various business models.

Their platform stands out with:
- **Seamless Payment Management:** All payment methods consolidated in a personalized portal, helping clients eliminate complex redirections.
- **Automation at Its Core:** Enable automatic payment setup that can drastically increase sign-ups for recurring payments.
- **Unparalleled Security Standards:** Toku ensures PCI Compliance Level 1 to safeguard sensitive transactions.

Partnerships with notable companies like SAP and others underline Toku‚Äôs credibility and its commitment to delivering high-quality service. Over the years, their client base has featured industry leaders and innovators, further cementing their reputation in the market.

If you're looking to streamline your accounts receivables processes and boost your cash flow, Toku could be the robust solution your business needs. You can learn more about their offerings at https://trytoku.com/ and even get a free consultation to see how they can power up your revenue management strategy.
